did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle: Letter from Prosper Montgomery Wetmore to J.L. Edwards, July 7, 1845
did.physdesc: This holding consists of a single letter, ALS, 1 p.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Letter from Prosper Montgomery Wetmore to J.L. Edwards, Accession # 7319, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This holding was purchased on February 25, 1963 and deposited on January 12, 1991.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: In this letter to J.L. Edwards, Prosper Montgomery Wetmore replies to previous letters from Edwards re Navy Pension Agency business: explains that he paid John Garrick, a pensioner, through July 1 and closed his account at the New York agency; discusses receiving some funds that had been delayed, says that he reported the delay to the proper department, and promises to check on the pensions of Adams, Hamilton, and Lervis.
